title: LOVELY SOUTH PHILADELPHIA TOWNHOUSE
description:
An opportunity to rent this delightful, spacious, 3 story, 3 bedroom house on a quiet street in this desirable Dickinson Narrows neighborhood and just around the corner from Dickinson Park. The property has undergone a recent refurbishment with a wonderful new kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and tasteful cabinetry.
Enter into a classic Victorian tiled vestibule which opens to a large living area, through the ceiling arch into the dining area and then the new kitchen. The back door opens to a small alleyway yard..
Upstairs are 3 bedrooms , the main, front bedroom has the added benefit of being able to inter connect with the middle bedroom. The 3rd bedroom is at the rear. Good size full bathroom. All the hardwood flooring has been tastefully refinished, retaining the original beautiful wood inlay. The house is newly painted throughout. There is a new washer and dryer in the kitchen area.
There is also a nice huge clean basement ideal for storage etc. Radiator heat and supplied window a/c units.
This is a really popular neighborhood surrounded by all the great eateries, cafes etc and a short distance to all the major supermarkets and local shopping. Easy access to center city and public transportation.
$1,750 per month + utilities. AVAILABLE MID FEBRUARY/MARCH 1ST. Sorry, no pets permitted

WOW! Check out this Charming and updated 3 bed 1.5 bath home, Step through the front door and into a welcoming living room with beautiful refinished hardwood flooring reflecting all of the natural light that pours into this classic charmer. The main level boasts a flowing floor plan, with the living room opening into the formal dining room, and into the kitchen, which offers new stainless dishwasher and new gas stove, and durable LVP flooring. Upstairs, 3 generous bedrooms, plenty of closet space and beautiful hardwood floors which share an updated full bath. The basement boasts plenty of storage space, as well as laundry hookups. Outside you'll find plenty of parking and a one-car garage, as well as a rare, very large an level fenced yard for Fido and the kids. Sitting on a quarter acre and complete with a 1 year home warranty.

title: Bella Vista - 3 Bed 3 Bath House in Meredith Catchment
description:
Newly renovated 3 bed, 3 bath home situated on a tree-lined block across from idyllic Cianfrani Park in highly sought-after Bella Vista. A towering brick facade greets you at the front of this 3-story home. Inside, a welcoming vestibule leads to the open main level, framed by hardwood floors and high ceilings.
A fireplace mantle centers the living room, while a set of tall windows fill the space with natural light. The separate dining area can easily accommodate a table for 6+. The modern kitchen has tons of storage and prep space, fitted with shaker cabinets, quartz counters, stainless steel appliances, a blue subway tile backsplash, and extra room for a cart with seating.
On the home's second level, two bright bedroom suites with full bathrooms and excellent closet space flank a conveniently located laundry closet. The third level is dedicated to the primary suite. Here, you'll find a large bedroom with tall windows, a double closet, and a full bathroom adorned with designer tile.
Completing the home is an expansive basement with lots of extra storage space. In addition to everything inside, this fantastic location earns a Walk Score of 99! Bella Vista is a vibrant community overflowing with friendly neighbors, local shops, popular restaurants, and idyllic parks. Just across the street, peaceful Cianfrani Park hosts community events throughout the year. This home is also a short stroll from lively corridors, including E Passyunk Ave, 11th St, Washington Ave, and the 9th St Italian Market. Plus, there's easy access to public transit, Pennsylvania and Jefferson hospitals, Center City, I-95, and South Jersey.
No short term rentals or subleasing.
Pets Allowed Case by Case.
